item.title: 12 NOTE ubuntu
item.description: recently sudo apt autoremove sudo apt install unrar unrar x file sudo apt install okular okular-extra-backends 常用 ls -a ll exit w who whoami which last pwd bg fg fg %1 bash sudo su man man tee history | sort -nr > history.txt echo $LANG sudo shutdown -h now sudo shutdown -r now sudo cat /etc/group dpkg -l dpkg -l *netease* sudo dpkg -i package_file.deb sudo dpkg -r package_name

item.title: 11 NOTE ubuntu think
item.description: 当前 sudo apt remove sogoupinyin sudo apt remove umbrello install- wordnet sudo apt install wordnet wn wnb install- dbvis sudo dpkg -i dbvis_linux_10_0_15.deb dbvis install- cmatrix sl sudo apt-get install cmatrix cmatrix sudo apt-get install sl sl install- smplayer sudo add-apt-repository ppa:rvm/smplayer sudo apt update sudo apt install smplayer smplayer-themes smplayer-skins install- dia-common sudo apt-get install dia-common install- rapidminer unzip rapidminer-studio-9.0.3.zip cd rapidminer-studio/ ./RapidMiner-Studio.sh install- XMind sudo dpkg -i

item.title: 10 NOTE regular express
item.description: python eg = <version>${log4j.version}</version> re = <version>.*</version> ^[0-9]{3}.mpfour sublime find what (.*),(.*) replace with $2,$1

item.title: 09 NOTE sqlplus
item.description: 登录问题 打开sqlplus后，可以看到要求输入用户名，口令和主机字符串。 前面两个都知道，但是后一个却不明白，查了资料才知道是安装时的全局数据

item.title: 08 NOTE postgre
item.description: postgres启动 docker exec -it sweb-db psql swebcore sweb docker exec -it sweb-du-db psql swebcore sweb docker exec -it sweb-db psql swebtest swebtester cd '/media/fengkai/BLACK/programming/10_sweb/sweb-webapi-runtime' ;mvn jetty:run -Pdomain_development -DskipTests 知识库查询 SELECT * FROM concepts WHERE ID IN () select count(*) from complex_types; select count(*) from complex_instances where complex_typ

item.title: 07 NOTE mysql
item.description: 二、 用户设定 SET PASSWORD FOR 'root'@'localhost' = PASSWORD('1'); CREATE USER 'milk'@'localhost' IDENTIFIED BY '1'; GRANT ALL ON helloontology.* TO 'milk'@'localhost'; CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS helloontology DEFAULT CHARSET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci; user pwd root user1 user1 grant select,insert,update,delete on *.* to user1@localhost Identified by "user1"; mysqld --initialize-insecure --user=user1 mysqld --initialize-insecure 一、 启动 windows下 管理员 cmd

item.title: 06 NOTE android
item.description: 二、 常用 gradle依赖问题 milk/build.gradle packagingOptions { exclude 'META-INF/DEPENDENCIES' } 外置SD卡是否存在 if(Environment.getExternalStorageState().equals(Environment.MEDIA_MOUNTED)) {} 代码中访问资源 context.getResources().openRawResource(R.raw.beifen) 一、 转移android代码 1.复制java代码 2.复制layo

item.title: 05 NOTE maven
item.description: 一、 maven 常用 mvn install mvn archetype:generate groupID:kai artifactID:hello-scroll 项目名 package:com.milk.demo 包名 java -cp target\hello-scroll-1.0-SNAPSHOT.jar com.milk.demo.App mvn eclipse:eclipse 二、 maven windows环境变量 MAVEN_HOME D:\programming\16maven\apache-maven-3.3.9 %MAVEN_HOME%\bin; 三、 maven 配置文件 D:\programming\16maven\apache-maven-3.3.9\conf settings.xml <localRepository>D:/programming/16maven/localrepository</localRepository> sweb-internal hanyu.zhang P@ssw0rd sweb-snapshots hanyu.zhang P@ssw0rd -- sweb-internal kai.feng Ba3bohgh sweb-snapshots kai.feng Ba3bohgh --

item.title: 04 NOTE latex
item.description: 三、 常用 显示直立文本：\textup{文本} 意大利斜体：\textit{文本} slanted斜体：\textsl{文本} 显示小体大写文本：\

item.title: 03 NOTE java
item.description: 四、 eclipse快捷键 多行选择 ALT + SHIFT + A 转小写字母 CTRL + SHIFT + Y 转大写字母 CTRL + SHIFT + X 自动import CTRL + SHIFT + O 复制当前行到下一行 CTRL + ALT + DOWN 三、

item.title: 02 NOTE git
item.description: 一、 常用 git clone http://dev.kidf.eu:88/scroll/scroll-lang-cn-bundle.git git status git checkout git add . git add scroll-lang-cn-bundle/src/test git checkout git checkout -b develop //新建并切换到新分支 git commit git checkout develop //切换到新分支 git push origin develop git branch //查看所有本地分支 git branch -a //查看

item.title: 01 NOTE hello hugo
item.description: 一、 环境 time: 2019.01.29 OS: Ubuntu 18.04.1 LTS OS type: 64-bit hugo version: v0.53 二、 操作，在terminal中 hugo version //版本v0.53 cd /media/fengkai/BLACK/programming/08_wd_html hugo new site hugowebsitekai //新建一个项目 cd hugowebsitekai/themes/ //到themes文件夹
